sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DashboardService } from "../dashboard.service"; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'top-bar', templateUrl: './top-bar.component.html', }) export class TopBarComponent { isDropdownOpen = false; constructor(private dashboard: DashboardService, private router: Router) {} openSidebar() { this.dashboard.openSidebar(); } toggleDropdown() { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; } logout() { // Perform any logout logic here (e.g., clear tokens) this.router.navigate(['/login']); // Navigate to the login page } }
